title: Action FPS/TPS Project
description: A template for FPS/TPS projects focused on weapon tuning, level design, and polished combat feel. Includes essential asset decks for weapons, maps, and enemies, with pre-built production pipelines using Journeys.

decks.name: Game Mechanics
decks.description: Defines the fundamental rules, core loops, and player progression. Use this deck for high-level design specs.

cards.content:
# Aiming Down Sights (ADS)

Mechanics for "Right-Click Aiming".

- **Action:** Toggles player into ADS mode.
- **Effect:** Zooms camera (amount defined per weapon), tightens weapon spread, and reduces player movement speed by 40%.
- **Transition Time:** 0.15s

# Core Movement

Defines the basic player controller specs.

- **Walk Speed:** 4.0 m/s
- **Run Speed:** 7.5 m/s (Requires 'Stamina' resource)
- **Crouch Speed:** 2.0 m/s
- **Time to full speed:** 0.2s
- **Stamina:** 100 points. Drains over 5s of sprinting. Recharges in 3s.

# Player Health

Defines player survivability.

- **Base Health:** 100 HP

# Reloading

Defines how ammo is managed.

- **System:** Magazine-based.
- **Standard Reload:** Plays full animation. Time is defined per weapon.
- **Tactical Reload:** If `bullets_in_mag > 0`, plays a faster animation and one bullet is kept in the chamber.
- **Interrupt:** Reload can be interrupted by sprinting or melee.

# Melee Combat

Default melee attack should deal 50 HP. Requires a 0.75s cool-down. Hit-box cone radius is 1.5 units.

decks.name: Weapons
decks.description: The live database for all weapons. Add a new weapon as a card, then start its journey to create all production tasks.

cards.content:
# Crossbow

The basic weapon type that players start with. **Damage:** 80. **Draw Time:** 1.5s. Bolt is projectile (no hitscan).

# Rifle

The standard-issue workhorse rifle. Balances stopping power with a manageable fire rate.

**Role:** All-Purpose Mid-Range
**Fire Mode:** Full-Auto / Semi-Auto (Selectable)
**Damage:** 32 HP per shot (body) / 60 HP (headshot)
**Rate of Fire:** 650 RPM
**Magazine Size:** 30 rounds
**Reload Time:** 2.9s
**Special Trait:** Hitscan. Recoil is high, but predictable (first 3 shots are very accurate).

# Shotgun

A pump-action shotgun designed for extreme close-quarters combat. Fires a pellet spread.

**Role:** CQC / Room Clearing
**Fire Mode:** Pump-Action
**Damage:** 8 pellets @ 20 HP each
**Rate of Fire:** 80 RPM
**Magazine Size:** 6 shells (tube-fed)
**Reload Time:** 1.0s (first shell) + 0.6s (per additional shell)
**Special Trait:** Hitscan. Damage falloff is severe. Pellets spread in a fixed pattern.

decks.name: Enemies
decks.description: Enemy units that the player will encounter. Add an enemy card, then start its journey.

cards.content:
# Patrol Drone

**Role:** Surveillance/Area Denial. **Behavior:** Follows set path, emits red light cone. If player enters cone, triggers alarm and fires weak lasers. **HP:** 25.

# The Screamer

**Role:** Support/Harassment. **Behavior:** Retreats from player but stops to emit a disabling auditory scream that slows player and attracts other enemies. **HP:** 50.

# Auto Turret

**Role:** Fixed defense/map hazard. **Behavior:** Static position, 180-degree view cone. Rapidly fires low-damage projectiles when alerted. **HP:** 75.

decks.name: Maps
decks.description: Repository for map concepts. Add a map card, then start its journey.

cards.content:
# Map 1: Warehouse

Design goal: Encourage close-quarters combat. Must verify all jump puzzles are possible with current player metrics.

# Map 2: Badlands

Design goal: Long-range engagements and verticality. Map features open canyons and tall sniper perches. Key Challenge: Limiting flank routes in the canyons to prevent spawntrapping.

steps.content: Conduct Map Playtest and gather feedback
